events.title: Full-stack developer
events.subtitle: Integratik
events.description: For the last few month of 2018 I worked at Integratik inc.  where I developed features for a web application used internally by a large medical company for managing their clients base.

events.title: Full-stack developer Internship
events.subtitle: Insum Solution
events.description: During the summer of 2018, I had an internship at Insum Solution inc. where I followed a formation for Oracle APEX and PL/SQL before building small websites using those tools of Rapid Application Development.

events.title: IT Specialist Internship
events.subtitle: Civilia
events.description: At the begining of 2018, I had my first internship at Civilia inc.  There, I built tools to analyse public transportation data and built a web application to give a simple user interface for clients to use the solutions offered by Civilia.

events.title: Bachelor in Computer Science
events.subtitle: Université de Montréal
events.description: From 2016 to 2019, I followed my bachelor where I learned about computer architecture, web developpement, software development, databases, theorical computer sciences and many other subjects.

events.title: DEC en Sciences Informatique et Mathématique
events.subtitle: Collège du Bois-de-Boulogne
events.description: In 2016, I graduated from the Bois-de-Boulogne CEGEP with a DEC focused on mathematics and software developement.

events.title: High school diploma
events.subtitle: Collège Mont-Saint-Louis
events.description: Optained my high school diploma with advanced mathematic and sciences classes.
